document_data.name: Iriaeboran North Brew
document_data.mainbody: '''Iriaeboran North Brew''' was a local brew from [[Iriaebor]] and was also sold through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]].
document_data.Description: This beer was appreciated by the commoners more than those with more refined palettes. It had a dark amber color combined with a bitter aftertaste. Iriaeborans called this the "bite of the north winds".
document_data.Prices:
Iriaeboran North Brew could be purchased in the following containers:
* Hand keg (9 [[cp]])
* Cask (5 [[sp]])
* Barrel (12 sp)
* [[Butt]] (4 [[gp]])
* [[Tun]] (8 gp)
document_data.History: The blacksmith's assistant [[Dovo]] had a [[mug]] of North Brew at the [[Bold Bard]] in [[Ghars]], [[Cormyr]], in [[Eleint]] of [[1367 DR]].<ref>
